<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.BidUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Server script called in client script
</description><name>BidUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var BidUtils = Class.create();
BidUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    validateBidAmount: function() {
        var itemId = this.getParameter('sysparm_item_name.number');
        var yourbidAmount = parseFloat(this.getParameter('sysparm_your_bid_amount'));

        // Use GlideRecordSecure to enforce ACLs for security
        var itemGr = new GlideRecordSecure('x_1383184_charityb_bid'); // Replace with your item table name
        if (itemGr.get('item_name.number', itemId)) {
            var startingBid = parseFloat(itemGr.getValue('item_name.start_bid_amount'));

            // Retrieve the highest current bid amount for the item
            var currentBidAmount = parseFloat(itemGr.getValue('highest_bid_amount'));
            if (isNaN(currentBidAmount) || currentBidAmount < startingBid) {
                currentBidAmount = startingBid;
            }

            // Validate if the bid amount is greater than the current bid amount
            if (yourbidAmount > currentBidAmount) {
                return 'valid';
            }
        }
        return 'invalid';
    }
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-24 05:46:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>38ea4a269352021094e3f15a7bba104a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>BidUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_38ea4a269352021094e3f15a7bba104a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-24 08:59:46</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
